messages.subject: Shinsengumi Sausage
messages.msgSnippet: Please examine this http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D2Ewqp3-_qU so essentially a normal sausage can be upgraded to shinsengumi sausage because it was in the
messages.messageBody:
Please examine this

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D2Ewqp3-_qU

so essentially a normal sausage can be upgraded to "shinsengumi
sausage" because it was in the Shinsengumi refrigerator.

I think that it's incredibly dangerous for anyone to accept a
suggestively shaped food item stored by the Shinsengumi XD

:: that is my yaoi moment for the day ::

but anyways I love the Gintama chara design for Kondou...I wish the
show was a bit more well written in terms of the humor XD
